knimeNode.name: Create Collection Column
knimeNode.shortDescription: Combines multiple columns into a new collection column.

fullDescription.intro: This node aggregates multiple columns in a separate new column, whose type is a "collection type". The cells in the new column are typed collections of cells; that is, the content can be safely be split into the original column content. The reverse operation is available in the "Split Collection Column" node.

tab.name: Manual Selection
tab.option: This list contains the names of the columns in the input table that are included in the output table.
This list contains the names of the columns in the input table that are excluded from the output table.
Use one of these fields to filter either the Include or Exclude list for certain column names or name substrings.

Use these buttons to move columns between the Include and Exclude list. Single-arrow buttons will move all selected columns. Double-arrow buttons will move all columns (filtering is taken into account).

Select this option to enforce the current exclusion list to stay the same even if the input table specification changes. If some of the excluded columns are not available anymore, a warning is displayed. (New columns will automatically be added to the inclusion list.)

Select this option to enforce the current inclusion list to stay the same even if the input table specification changes. If some of the included columns are not available anymore, a warning is displayed. (New columns will automatically be added to the exclusion list.)

tab.name: Wildcard/Regex Selection
tab.option: Type a search pattern which matches columns to move into the Include list. You can use either Wildcards ('?' matching any character, '*' matching a sequence of any characters) or Regex. You can specify if your pattern should be case sensitive.

tab.name: Type selection
tab.option: Select the column types that you want to include. Column types that are currently not present are depicted in italic.

tab.name: Collection type

option.name: Create a collection of type 'set' (doesn't store duplicate values)

tab.option: If checked, a collection column of type set is created. Set collections contain only distinct values, duplicates are deleted.
If checked, missing values are ignored, i.e. not stored in collection cells.

tab.name: Output table structure
tab.option: If checked, aggregated columns are removed from out put table.

option.name: Enter the name of the new column

tab.option: Specifies the name of the new column containing the collection cells.

outPort.name: Input data with new collection column

ports.outPort: The input data along with a newly appended collection column.
